to toil; labor; laborer; to put sb to trouble (of doing sth); meritorious deed; to console (Taiwan pr. lao4 for this sense)
трудиться; труд; чернорабочий; доставлять кому-то неприятности (делать что-то); похвальный поступок; для утешения (Тайвань пр. lao4 в этом смысле)

láo: (глаг) утруждать кого-л. просьбой (сделать что-л.)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your effort (力) is covered (冖) with two fires (火) in the classroom
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Automated greenhouses only need electric power, not human labor muscle.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from the second " fire " and " clothes " from the point of counting. It means to sew clothes under the fire, and then refers to all hard work (see Ji Xusheng). The first type of Bronze inscription inherits the oracle bone inscriptions, from " clothing " to the second " fire "; the second type of font is from the second " fire " to the " heart ", which means that the heart will work. The third glyph starts from " force ", which means physical exertion.

Oracle is used as a place name, and it is pronounced as " water logging " to indicate floods. Jin Wen expresses hard work, the uncle bell: "Jin (diligence) does his political affairs", and also expresses his hard work, Zhongshan Wang Ding: "worry about the laobang family."

"Said Wen": "Labor, drama. Congli, shining province. ying, fire burning, hard work. 𢥒, ancient writings are learned."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts from the second " fire " and " clothes " from the point of counting. It means to sew clothes under fire, and then refers to all hard work (see Ji Xusheng).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從二「火」從「衣」從數點，會於火下縫衣辛勞之意，後泛指一切辛勞(參季旭昇)。金文第一種字形上承甲骨文，從「衣」從二「火」；第二種字形從二「火」從「心」，會勞心之意。第三種字形從「力」，表示體力操勞。

　　甲骨文用作地名，又通讀為「澇」，表示水災。金文表示辛勞，叔尸鐘：「堇(勤)勞其政事」，又表示勞心，中山王鼎：「憂勞邦家」。

　　《說文》：「勞，劇也。从力，熒省。熒，火燒冂，用力者勞。𢥒，古文勞从悉。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從二「火」從「衣」從數點，會於火下縫衣辛勞之意，後泛指一切辛勞(參季旭昇)。

(Simplified: 劳)
Ideographic: A man lifting 力 a load 冖 of grass 炏
Antonyms: 逸
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 炏 [ kài ] grass
    • 冖 [ mì ] cover
    • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence
①人類創造物質或精神財富的活動：勞動。勞力。勞逸。功勞(功業，成績)。按勞分配。
②辛苦，辛勤：勞苦。勞頓(勞累困頓)。勞瘁(勞累病苦)。勞碌(事情多而辛苦)。勞心。疲勞。煩勞。任勞任怨。
③勞動者的簡稱：勞工(舊時指工人)。勞資。
④用力：勞苦功高。勤勞。徒勞無功。
⑤用言語或實物慰問：慰勞。勞軍(慰勞軍隊)。
⑥姓氏。
⑦逸。

甲骨文從二「 火 」從「 衣 」從數點，會於火下縫衣辛勞之意，後泛指一切辛勞(參季旭昇)。金文第一種字形上承甲骨文，從「 衣 」從二「 火 」；第二種字形從二「 火 」從「 心 」，會勞心之意。第三種字形從「 力 」，表示體力操勞。 甲骨文用作地名，又通讀為「 澇 」，表示水災。金文表示辛勞，叔尸鐘：「堇(勤)勞其政事」，又表示勞心，中山王鼎：「憂勞邦家」。 《說文》：「勞，劇也。从力，熒省。熒，火燒冂，用力者勞。𢥒，古文勞从悉。」
Oracle starts from the second " fire" and " clothes" from the point of counting. It means to sew clothes under the fire, and then refers to all hard work (see Ji Xusheng). The first type of Bronze inscription inherits the oracle bone inscriptions, from " clothing" to the second " fire"; the second type of font is from the second " fire" to the " heart", which means that the heart will work. The third glyph starts from " force", which means physical exertion. Oracle is used as a place name, and it is pronounced as " water logging" to indicate floods. Jin Wen expresses hard work, the uncle bell: "Jin (diligence) does his political affairs", and also expresses his hard work, Zhongshan Wang Ding: "worry about the laobang family." "Said Wen": "Labor, drama. Congli, shining province. ying, fire burning, hard work. 𢥒, ancient writings are learned."

勞字的基本解释

勞
láo
见“劳”。

勞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［láo］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
“劳1”的繁体字。
(1)操劳；劳动。
(2)指劳动者；劳动力。
(3)疲劳；劳苦。
(4)忧愁；愁苦。
(5)功劳；功绩。
(6)烦劳；麻烦。
(7)频繁；繁多。
(8)病名。中医谓积渐而成的慢性疾患，如五劳、六极等。
(9)病名。通“癆”。肺结核。
(10)通“撈”。夺取。
(11)姓。
[②]［lào］［láo］
［《廣韻》郎到切，去号，來。］
亦作“1”。“劳2”的繁体字。
(1)（今读láo）慰劳。
(2)同“耮”。一种耕后碎土和平土的农具。亦指耢地。
[③]［liáo］
［《集韻》憐蕭切，平蕭，來。］
“劳3”的繁体字。通“遼1”。
广阔。

勞字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勞； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页148第35
〔古文〕??【唐韻】魯刀切【集韻】郞刀切，?音牢。【說文】劇也。从力，熒省。用力者勞。【爾雅·釋詁】勞，勤也。【易·兌卦】悅以先民，民志其勞。【史記·文帝本紀】朕親郊祀上帝諸神，禮官議毋諱以勞朕。又事功曰勞。【禮·儒行】先勞而後祿。【註】猶事也。又憂也。【曹丕·與吳質書】未足解其勞結。【註】謂憂心之結。又姓。【廣韻】後漢有琅邪勞丙。又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?郞到切，牢去聲。【廣韻】勞，慰也。【禮·曲禮】君勞之，則拜。【韻會】勞者，敘其勤以答也。

勞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勞字的起名意思

暂无。

labor
Basic explanation of words
labor
láo
See "Lao".
labor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［láo］
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
Traditional characters for "劳1".
(1) Work hard; work.
(2) Refers to laborers; labor force.
(3) Fatigue; toil.
(4) Sorrow; sorrow.
(5) Credit; merit.
(6) Troublesome; troublesome.
(7) Frequent; numerous.
(8) The name of the disease. Traditional Chinese medicine refers to chronic diseases that accumulate gradually, such as five labors and six extremes.
(9) The name of the disease. Linked with "tuberculosis". tuberculosis.
(10) Through "fishing". Capture.
(11) Last name.
[②]［lào］［láo］
["Guangyun" Lang to cut, go to the number, come. ]
Also called "1". Traditional characters of "劳2".
(1) (Láo today) Consolation.
(2) Same as "耮". A farm tool that crushes and level soil after ploughing. Also refers to the land.
[③] [liáo]
["Ji Yun" Ping Xiaoqie, Ping Xiao, come. ]
Traditional characters of "劳3". Link "Liao 1".
broad.
labor
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　 Lao; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 148 to 35
[Ancient text]?? [Tang Yun] Lu knife cut [Ji Yun] Tan knife cut, the sound is firm. [Said the text] The drama is also. Congli, Yingsheng. Those who work hard work hard. 【Erya·Shiguo】Work hard and diligent. [Easy·Dui Gua] The ancestors are pleased, and the people are dedicated to their work. [Historical Records·Benji of Emperor Wen] My relatives offered sacrifices to the gods and gods. It's hard work. 【Rite·Confucianism】Work first, then pay. [Note] Still things are also. Worry again. 【Cao Pi·and Wu Zhishu】Not enough to solve his troubles. [Note] That is the knot of worry. Another surname. [Guangyun] Langxie Laobing in the Later Han Dynasty. Also 【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Go to the top of the cut, go to the sound. [Guang Yun] Work, comfort. [Li·Qu Li] If you are a king, worship. [Rhyme Club] Those who work hard, recount their diligence and answer.
